name: BallJump
description:
CONTROLS:

1) Arrow keys to move.

2) "D" to spawn balls, which you can jump on, "F" to raise the balls.

3) "Spacebar" to jump.

I made this game both for fun and for practice. It took less than a month and development mainly took place after work hours. Anyway, more important: have fun and if you really have a good time playing my game, check out my other game: Hollow Candy Hunt!
